response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and utility, I understand its true worth to be $10,000. However, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that could potentially save you thousands in the long run and bring significant benefits to your endeavors. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 9500}
